revised_title: Observations on the Barometer, Thermometer, and Rain in Lyndon, Rutland, and Surrounding Areas in 1789
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of weather observations, including barometer, thermometer, and rainfall, in Lyndon, Rutland, and surrounding areas in 1789. The author also discusses the impact of the frost on trees, fish, and crops, as well as the differences in weather patterns between different regions.
